entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of hail this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of hail. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 3 April 2023
